name: Pasta with Cabbage and Bacon
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat a frying pan over medium heat and saut√© bacon until about half done. Add Marinara Sauce Mix and heat until aromatic. Add cabbage and toss well.
Stir in hot pasta and white wine vinegar, tossing to evenly coat. Season with Salt and Pepper before serving.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.
